label: Lapsewood 18
description:
John asks Hubert who he is, to which Hubert replies "A great and powerful sorcerer."  Actually just a wizard who was a friend of the King's before he started acting strangely.

Meanwhile back in John's realm, A very dapper gentleman is running down the Las Vegas stip evading the police on foot, while a crow follows him from the air...

Hit 1 to continue.

Hit 0 to quit.
